title: 5.15 Select Ward skin bug
body: When you have switched accounts on the same computer. The ward skin that you have selected from the last account is still showing, regardless you own it or not with your current account. This only happens in champ select though, in game you won't see the ward skin that you do not own.

replies.body:
Hey Sirref,

Thanks for the report! Looks like this is a visual bug - we'll investigate the issue and get it resolved :]
